title: Sausage casserole with mash and red wine
ingredients: ['1 jar of sausage casserole sauce, such as Homepride', '8 sausages', '1 handful of bean sprouts', 'chopped chives, as much as u like', 'small tin of baked beans', '13cl of red wine (merlot if poss)', '6 mushrooms, chopped', 'pancetta', 'tinned carrots', 'tinned sweetcorn', 'tinned petit pois peas', 'instant mash', 'chopped onion']
